definitions: In Agile software development, the Product Owner is a role responsible for maximizing the value of the product resulting from the work of the Development Team.
The Product Owner is the sole person responsible for managing the Product Backlog, including its content, ordering, and ensuring it is visible, transparent, and clear to all.
A key stakeholder in a Scrum team who bridges the gap between customer, business, and the development team.
examples: The Product Owner prioritized the backlog.
She is the Product Owner for the new app.
The Product Owner clarified the user story.
